nodes.text: This starship was used by the female bounty hunter Janna Relasi during her hunts for House Salaktori. She used the onboard computer to perform research on her prey. After a disaster hunt, a fatally-wounded, barely alive Relasi returned to her ship and, once there, asked her droid GSAD-43 "get them for me." To discover of whom her request pertained, GSAD-43 checked the ship's computer.
